title: The Reef at Michaelmas Cay
creator_credit: Douglas B. Steen and Douglas Steen Productions
brief_description: Shows a party of divers exploring marine life at Michaelmas Cay, a Great Barrier Reef island near Cairns. Includes scenes of giant clams, razor fish, stone fish, butterfly cod, moray eels, and green turtles.
